page.title: 02Sport In Grendon.
page.content: In Grendon Underwood there are two football teams.They have a first team and a reserve team and they are both called Grendon Rangers.They play in a kit of gold and black and they are good.They have not got a boys team.Grendn Rangers enter these cups each season North Bucks Cup,Buckingham Charity Cup,Oving Village Cup,League Shield and the Marsworth Cup.After entering,one of these cups is often won by Grendon Rangers. The Swan Taverners Cricket Team have matches on Sundays,sometimes against the Springhill Prison Officers Team or the Springhill Prison Team. There is a Badminton Club which meets on a Monday in the village hall. The Swan public house and the Plough and Anchor public house both have Darts teams.
